help_page.title: Help Center
help_page.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services.

faqs.question: What is Vcanship?
faqs.answer: Vcanship is a global shipping platform that helps you find the best routes and rates for your parcels and freight.

faqs.question: How do I track my shipment?
faqs.answer: You can track your shipment using the tracking number provided. Click the 'Track' button in the header to enter your tracking ID.

faqs.question: How do I book a shipment?
faqs.answer: Select a service from the main page, fill in the shipment details, and complete the booking process.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept various payment methods including credit cards, bank transfers, and digital wallets.

faqs.question: How do I create an account?
faqs.answer: Click on 'Login / Sign Up' in the header and follow the registration process.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.stats_placeholder: Welcome to your dashboard! Select an option above to get started.

parcel.title: Send a Parcel
parcel.subtitle: Complete the form step by step to get the best shipping rates.

sender.title: Sender Information
sender.description: Enter your contact details. This information will be used for the shipping label and tracking updates.
sender.name: Full Name
sender.name_tooltip: Enter your full name as it should appear on the shipping label
sender.email_tooltip: We'll send tracking updates to this email
sender.postcode_tooltip: Enter postcode or country code (e.g., GB, US)

recipient.title: Recipient Information
recipient.description: Enter the recipient's contact details. This information is required for delivery.
recipient.name: Full Name
recipient.name_tooltip: Enter the recipient's full name as it should appear on the shipping label
recipient.email_tooltip: Optional: Recipient will receive delivery notifications
recipient.postcode_tooltip: Enter postcode or country code (e.g., US, GB)

details.title: Parcel Details
details.description: Tell us about your parcel to get accurate shipping rates.
details.type_hint: This helps us suggest the best shipping options
details.type_tooltip: Select the type that best describes your shipment
details.description_tooltip: Brief description of contents (required for customs)
details.dimensions_hint: Accurate dimensions help us provide better rates and ensure your parcel fits carrier requirements.
details.value_hint: Required for customs declaration and insurance
details.value_tooltip: Value of items for customs and insurance purposes

options.title: Additional Options
options.description: Customize your shipment with optional services.
options.insurance_description: Protect your shipment against loss or damage. Coverage up to
options.signature_description: Require recipient signature upon delivery for added security.
options.fragile_description: Extra careful handling for fragile items.
options.instructions_tooltip: Special instructions for the delivery driver
options.instructions_placeholder: e.g., Leave at front door, Ring doorbell twice

review.title: Review Your Details
review.description: Please review all information before proceeding to get quotes.
review.summary_note: Shipping rates will be calculated based on your parcel details. Additional service costs will be added to the final quote.
